---
title: "Markdown ni Marde"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
yeardata <- select(honey, totalprod, year, Region)
yeardata$totalprod <- log(yeardata$totalprod)
SE <- Rmisc::summarySE(data = yeardata, measurevar = "totalprod", groupvars = c("year", "Region"))
yeardata$year <- as.factor(yeardata$year)
pd <- position_dodge(0.1)
na.omit(SE)

yearplot <- ggplot(SE, aes(x = year, y = totalprod, colour = "red", group = 1)) + 
    geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = SE$totalprod - ci, ymax = SE$totalprod + ci), 
                  width=.1, position = pd) +
    geom_line(position = pd) +
    geom_point(position = pd, size = 1, shape = 21, fill = "white") +
 theme(text=element_text(size = 11,  family = "serif"),
       axis.ticks.x = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") + facet_wrap(~Region);
yearplot
```
